author: mjfh
content: has `snap/1` support declined in general? i see lots of `geth` failed handling error messages (aka empty replies) with `mainnet` and `goerli` -- same with my `nimbus` test software

author: mjfh
content: is there a test net preferred for  running`snap/1`?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: It shouldn't have, we still use snap/1, I think erigon might return empty replies, but geth should reply correctly
